div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 572 Rupci, c. 55 km. S of Pleven, Bulgaria, 1960 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 32 AR. Pot hoard Thasos: 4 spread-flan tetradr. Apollonia, Illyria: 3 dr. Dyrrhachium: 25 dr. Disposition: Pleven Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 265
